Stay So

Live the Lent and the Advent in a new style.

The official app made for Azione Cattolica Ambrosiana for the Lent and the Advent.

This is an initiative of Azione Cattolica Studenti with the gospel of the day, the weekly path of Lent and Advent 2015, with readings, insights and opportunities for discussion.
